BarLineInterface¶

class abjad.barline.interface.BarLineInterface(_client)¶

Bases: abjad.core.interface._Interface, abjad.core.grobhandler._GrobHandler

Manage barlines.

abjad> t = Note(0, (1, 4))
abjad> t.barline
<BarLineInterface>

Override LilyPond BarLine grob.

abjad> t.barline.color = 'red'
abjad> print t.format
\once \override BarLine #'color = #red
c'4
kind¶

Read / write LilyPond barline string.

  • Default value: None.

  • All values: LilyPond barline string, None.

    abjad> t = Note(0, (1, 4))
abjad> t.barline.kind = '|.'
abjad> t.barline.kind
'|.'

abjad> print t.format
c'4
\bar "|."
